title: IZOD Men's Advantage Performance Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
description: POLO SHIRTS FOR MEN: IZOD Advantage Performance polos for men deliver an easy casual design combined with timeless style. Our men's polo shirts are comfortable, versatile, and perfect for a wide variety of occasions.

BUTTON-UP POLO: Available in multiple colors and sizes S–3XL, each classic golf shirt features a regular cut, a roll-resistant collar, and Sport Flex technology with the right amount of stretch for all-day comfort and maximum flexibility.

MOISTURE-WICKING FABRIC: This polo is made from a lightweight and breathable blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester. The fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep you cool and comfortable whether you're out with friends or relaxing at home.
INNOVATIVE DESIGN & EASY CARE: Our classic polo for men offers an innovative UV-15 finish for ultimate sun protection. This collared golf shirt is easy to wear and is machine washable for easy care.

ELEVATE YOUR STYLE: IZOD has the perfect combination of reliable, classic clothing with refined details and unparalleled quality. From the office to the club to the outdoors, experience the flawless balance of modern trends and enduring fashion.
